channel.title: Teaching on Jeff Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Jeff Zhang

item.description:
Teaching assistant at Penn

  • STAT 4310: Statistical Inference, Spring ’25 – Undergraduate Level
    Taught by Edgar Dobriban

  • STAT 9220: Advanced Causal Inference, Fall ’24 – Graduate Level
    Taught by Eric Tchetgen Tchetgen

  • STAT 921: Observational Studies, Spring ’24 – Graduate Level
    Taught by Dylan Small

  • STAT 101: Introduction to Business Statistics, Spring ’23 – Undergraduate Level
    Taught by Darin Kapanjie

  • STAT 102: Introduction to Business Statistics, Fall ’21 – Undergraduate Level
    Taught by Shuva Gupta
